subtitle: A wonderful creamy based ice cream served with crunchy praline pieces.

method.text: To make the praline, put the sugar and almonds in a heavy based pan and heat gently until sugar melts and turns to a caramel and the almonds brown. Stir to mix in any remaining sugar and leave to turn a nut-brown colour.
lmmediately pour onto an oiled baking sheet and leave until cold. Crush three quarters of the praline with a rolling pin or mouli grater, leaving the rest for decoration
Whisk egg whites until stiff and dry looking, then gradually whisk in the sugar.
Whisk cream to a soft peak. Then mix in the yogurt, egg whites and crushed praline. Turn into a rigid container, cover, seal and freeze.
Chill for 45 min before serving. Scoop into chilled glasses and decorate with shards of the remaining praline.

title: Almond praline ice cream
